This machine does not contain any already configured model.

abstract IFiniteStateMachine org.ofsm.IFiniteStateMachineBuilder.getMachine (  String  streamType,
InputStream  stream
)  throws Exception [pure virtual]
 

Get machine implementation by stream type and input stream.

The library supports implementation for a model specified by XML format. This implementation registered a machine by type (pattern) *.ofsm.xml. This pattern must be specified in streamType param.

Example: 

 // Creating machine builder
  IFiniteStateMachineBuilder bldr = FiniteStateMachineFactory.getInstance().newBuilder();
  // Creating the finite state machine for resource stream
  IFiniteStateMachine machine = bldr.getMachine("example.ofsm.xml",getClass().getResourceAsStream("/org/ofsm/examples/example.ofsm.xml"));
Parameters:
streamType Type of stream identifier
stream Input model as stream
Returns:
Configured finite state machine

abstract IFiniteStateMachine org.ofsm.IFiniteStateMachineBuilder.getMachine (  URI  uri  )  throws Exception [pure virtual]
 

Get machine implementation by URI (e.g.

file:// or http://). Library contain an implementation that supports network URI (http,ftp, and all others that support standard java.net.URL). Also a local URI supports too.

Example: 

   // Creating machine builder
   IFiniteStateMachineBuilder bldr = FiniteStateMachineFactory.getInstance().newBuilder();
   
   // Creating the finite state machine for resource stream
   IFiniteStateMachine machine = bldr.getMachine(new java.net.URI("file://usr/local/mymachine.ofsm.xml"));
The library supports implementation for a model specified by XML format. This implementation registered a machine by type (pattern) *.ofsm.xml. This pattern must be specified in path of URI.
Parameters:
uri The URI which contain location of machine model
Returns:
Configured finite state machine
